carpet.rule.anvilNeverDamageByFalling.de: When enabled, anvils will never take damage from falling.
carpet.rule.beaconLagOptimization.desc: When enabled, reduces lag caused by beacons.
carpet.rule.ItemFrameAlwaysStayAttach.de: When enabled, item frames always stay attached unless player breaks them.
carpet.rule.enableFastOpCommand.desc: When enabled, provides faster OP command support.
carpet.rule.enableEntitySearchCommand.de: When enabled, provides faster EntitySearchCommand support.
carpet.rule.itemDespawnImmediately.desc: When enabled, dropped items despawn instantly.
carpet.rule.itemNeverDespawn.desc: When enabled, dropped items will never despawn.
